name: Blowball Integration
author: Probelix GmbH

sections.description:
Blowball is a middleware solution for businesses with multiple functions for e-commerce, product information management (PIM), marketing and CRM.
With this plugin you’ll connect WordPress with Blowball and include different functions on your website.

Currently the following functions are supported:

  • Connection with Contact Form 7 plugin. Contacts submitting a form via Contact Form 7 can be synchronized with Blowball.

PS: For this plugin you need your own Blowball instance to connect to.
sections.changelog:
1.3.10

  • Small improvements for user registration

1.3.9

  • WordPress 6.5 Support + drained_weigth Attribute for product data

1.3.8

  • WordPress 6.4 Support + Form field for store selection

1.3.7

  • WordPress 6.3 Support + Small fixes

1.3.6

  • Small fixes

1.3.5

  • Added additional fields for product data

1.3.4

  • Added additional shortcodes for stores plugin

1.3.3

  • Small improvements on user plugin

1.3.2

  • Small improvements on user and store plugins

1.3.1

  • Added login via blowball

1.2.2

  • Added additional server methods

1.2.0

  • WooCommerce plugin added. With this plugin you can push products from blowball to WooCommerce

1.1.2

  • Store plugin added. With this it is possible to transfer stores from Blowball to WordPress. Supports synchronization with the Agile Store Locator plugin

1.0.4

  • Added possibility to add a field as a sending condition

1.0.3

  • Switched lead generation endpoint for compatibility with current blowball version

1.0.2

  • Functions added to enable use by other plugins

1.0.1

  • Tested WordPress 5.9, Small fixes.

1.0.0

  • Initial Version
